text: Is there a way to get all files from the specific folder with HubL on server side? I know there is a way to do <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Files-API-Get-List-of-all-files-in-Folder/td-p/463386|this via api> but any tips to do this with HubL?
Hi, a colleague of mine is doing the CMS practicum and they ask him to use a custom module to modify the header and footer fonts
